title: One Bedroom
posting_body: Extra large one bedroom apartment with huge living room, large kitchen and dining area,  reserved parking spot and tons of storage storage unit in basement as well as 5x10 storage room off kitchen.
Walking distance to Redline, gym, grocery store.
Rent includes heat, gas, garbage and water.
Air conditioning unit in the living room.
Plenty of room for an office area in the living room or dining area.
Great location for Northwestern University and Loyola University.
Willing to look at lease for school year rather than 12 month if needed.
Close to Pottawattomie Park and Fitness Center.
